snippet.title: Downhill Jam Trailer
snippet.description:
Created for University of Gloucestershire "COMX" exhibition as part of an advanced group project, Downhill Jam is a hoverboarding trick combo game, similar to "Jet Set Radio" or "Tony Hawk" series. Players must ride their hoverboard down the city hills, scoring points by performing tricks, grinding rails, grabbing cash and avoiding wiping out.

The game can be downloaded on itch.io
